name: Scout's Speed
summary: You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout ahead and report back without slowing your allies.
description:
You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout ahead and report back without slowing your allies. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed. When calculating your travel speed, this increases to a +20-foot status bonus.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
